general.congratsOnCreatingVault: Great, you have created your Liquid Vault!
general.addFundsAndStartProtect: Now, let’s add funds and start protecting them
general.protectByAddingBackupAndInheritance: Protect your funds by adding backup and inheritance
general.addInheritance: Add inheritance to fully protect your funds
general.addBackup: Add backup to fully protect your funds
general.instructionsMessage: If you plan to move a large amount of Ether or tokens, you should send a test transaction of a small amount to the destination wallet first to ensure everything goes as planned. Optional, but highly recommended
general.paymentMessage: Payment will be taken upon activation.
general.wrongNetwork: This application currently supports only Rinkeby network.
general.toMoveAssets: To move assets to your Vault press on desired one

unlockInfo.create: Create a vault and start protecting your funds by using the backup and inheritance system

backup.backupCreationProcessWarning: Your’e in a backup creation process, please connect with your backup wallet to approve the request
backup.dontHaveBackup: You do not have a backup wallet yet
backup.timerDescription: Once the timer runs out, the vault enters a standby mode and allows your backup wallet to take ownership. The timer is defined in pause mode and can be started by either the main wallet or the backup wallet
backup.createDescription: Add backup wallet to your vault and protect your money
backup.loginToApprove: log in with your backup wallet and approve the request to register the wallet
backup.approveDescription: Approve and become the backup owner for this Liquid Vault
backup.summaryDescription: Please make sure everything is as you wish

centerMessage.title: Setup backup wallet
centerMessage.message: If you are the owner of BackupWallet, Login with BackupWallet and approve request, or wait until the BackupWallet owner will respond.

approve.title: This account was defined as BackupWallet
approve.addressTitle: Wallet address that set you up
approve.message: If you approve, this account will only be BackupWallet as long as

startTimer.title: Start timer.
startTimer.message: If you start the timer, you will be able to get ownership after the time's up

unlock.subTitle: Kirobo Safe is the most trusted platform to manage digital assets. Here is how to get started:

metamask.noMetamask: No MetaMask detected, please install MetaMask to you web browser

dialog.title: Unlock Ledger Wallet
instructions: Make sure your Ledger device is connected
Make sure you installed Ethereum on your Ledger device via Ledger Live
Go to Ethereum settings on your Ledger device and allow Contract Data

inheritance.dontWorry: Don't worry, you will always be able to cancel/reset your inactivity time period
inheritance.resetExplanation: You can always reset the timer.
